it.unica.foresee.datasets.interfaces
Interface Dataset<T extends DatasetElement>

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
DatasetVector<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Dataset, DatasetSparseVector, DatasetVector, Movielens, MovielensElement
public interface Dataset<T extends DatasetElement>
extends java.lang.Iterable<T>

Represents a generic dataset.

Method Summary

          Get the element at the specified index.

          Get the partitions obtained using the stratified k-fold algorithm.
abstract  void setDatasetElement(int index, T e)
          Set an element at a specified index.
